alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 5:01PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Chouteau County through 530 PM MDT... At 500 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Geraldine, or 15 miles east of Fort Benton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail and brief heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Sandy, Geraldine, Loma, Iliad, and Virgelle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
